txt.en: Challenge: The Power of the Dwarf-rings
Desperate to reclaim Manthríf, King Váskmun Greytooth has led the Firehorns into the Abyss of Mordath, but where has the elusive Dwarf-ring come to rest?
Confront King Váskmun Greytooth and the Firehorns
Desperate to reclaim Manthríf, King Váskmun Greytooth has led the Firehorns into the Abyss of Mordath, but where has the elusive Dwarf-ring come to rest?
Defeat Fingar the Greedy after fully overcoming every manifestation of Dragon-spell
You and your fellows must fully survive each of Fingar's manifestations of Dragon-spell before defeating the Worm of Angband.
